name: OrangeNoiseforSleep,Relaxation,andFocus
0:
”Alexa open orange noise”
”Alexa ask orange noise to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: orange noise
des:
Orange Noise is a proven and effective way to block out distractions and fall asleep easy. With a lower frequency sound than White or Pink noise, Orange Noise is the ultimate soothing companion for relaxation, focus, and better sleep. 

All you need to do is say Alexa start Orange Noise for Sleep, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
